column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////First time and jesus it is definitely all it's fracked up to be. Got the petite filet
column2: creamed spinach (the. Cheese omg) the frites! And east coast oysters. The oysters were to die for. Spinach second
column3: steak third and the fries are cooked in steak fat- amazing but I'm not the biggest fry eater. The bartender was so sweet and gave me the spinach for free because I was alone for my first time and couldn't decide.
